job.name: Web Language Model
job.description: Welcome to the Microsoft Web Language Model API, a REST-based cloud service providing state-of-the-art tools for natural language processing. Using this API, your application can leverage the power of big data through language models trained on web-scale corpora collected by Bing in the EN-US market.
